name: No Smoking
review:
This movie is a subject. More you watch, you grow from elementary to reach a Ph.D. level. Every scene is tailor-made and throws some excitement. Anurag Kashyap has made a marvelous script which is directed wonderfully by him. Acting performances are neither a concern here nor a topic of discussion. Amalgamated by excellent situational music by Vishal Bharadwaj, this masterpiece is one of the best Bollywood movies that should be boasted proudly.

Storyline Rating: 5

Acting Rating: 3
John Abraham: 3
Ayesha Takia: 3
Paresh Rawal: 4
Ranvir Shorey: 3

Direction Rating: 5

Music Rating: 4

Cinematography: 3

Editing: 5
